attributes.action: Stop TFL penalising London's commercial-use vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Trade vehicles, vans, lorries, and even cars used for trade purposes are penalised to the same extent as private transportation. London needs its deliveries, tradespeople, and commerce. We would like genuine trade-use vehicles to have a discount on the congestion charge, not be penalised for keeping London at the forefront of world commerce.
